infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: We use tracking to provide you with personalized content and improve your app experience.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Pik AI uses your camera to capture photos that serve as input images for AI video generation. When you take a photo, the image is uploaded to our servers where it is processed and animated using AI technology to create a video. For example, if you take a photo of yourself, we will use that image to generate an animated video where you appear to move or react, which you can then save and share.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Pik AI needs access to your microphone to record audio for your AI-generated videos. For example, you can add sound effects or voiceovers to enhance your video creations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Pik AI needs permission to save your AI-generated videos to your photo library. For example, after creating a video with our AI effects, you can save it directly to your Photos app to share with friends.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Pik AI accesses your photo library to select existing photos that will be used as source images for AI video generation. When you choose a photo, it is uploaded to our servers where it is processed and animated using AI technology to transform the static image into a video. For example, if you select a photo of a landscape, we will animate elements in that photo to create a dynamic video showing movement, which you can then download and share.
